00163 inline iview::IColorShema::TickerType operator|(iview::IColorShema::TickerType tickerType1, iview::IColorShema::TickerType tickerType2)
00164 {
00165        return (iview::IColorShema::TickerType)(int(tickerType1) | int(tickerType2));
00166 }
